sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function BotItem({image,name, health, damage, armor, bot_class, catchphrase, id, handleClicked, handleDelete}){ return(
handleClicked(id)} key={name+id}>

{name}

{bot_class}

{catchphrase}

Health: {health}

Damage: {damage}

Armor: {armor}

) } export default BotItem
